english: Regulations Governing Advertisement and Promotion of Food Products Not Suitable for Long-term Consumption by Children
title: 不適合兒童長期食用之食品廣告及促銷管理辦法
history: Promulgated and Enforced by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, Order No. 1031203887 on 20 November 2014.

articles.content: This set of Regulations is enacted pursuant to Article 28 Paragraph 3 of the Act Governing Food Safety and Sanitation (“the Act”).
Violators of the Regulations are subjected to penalties as set forth in Article 45 of the Act.
This set of Regulations takes effect from January 1, 2016.
